title: HARVESTING Okra in MY GARDEN || How to Harvest Okra  @farmguards

tasks.task: Harvesting okra in a mixed cropping field.
subtasks: Observing the mixed cropping arrangement, noting okra among other crops like young corn and cassava.
Using a knife to cut okra fruits from the plants instead of hand-picking.
Checking multiple plants to ensure thorough harvesting.
Ensuring harvested okra is fresh and soft for consumption, rather than allowing them to mature and become too hard.
Considering the purpose of leaving mature okra on the plant for seed preservation.
